game.name: Fly or Die
game.description:
The brainless zombies have invaded your city and you can only see the human blood on road. Oh my God! No one has the dare to watch out this massacre on news channel or live. After seeing that situation, your close friend has finally decided to use your aircraft to clear a horde of blood-thirsty zombies from the mother hive deep in the zombie territory. Common boys! You cannot leave your friend alone in that situation. After all, it is also a matter of your own life. 
Join Fly or Die and be prepared to guide your friend to operate the aircraft like never before! Kill zombies, destroy enemy planes and everything that could spoil your city in this brand new action game! After each killing and destruction of the objects will help you to earn some money. Upgrade your aircraft with the help of that money and get ready to fly through multiple areas to complete your mission! You can improve your gun, engine, body, fuel tank and elevator using your cash. 
Kill as much blood-thirsty undeads as you can to make your aircraft enough powerful to survive for as long as possible! This is a situation of do and die so take your seat on your plane, destroy all your zombies and bring the peace of your city back. You have several other locations to complete your mission. Use the map to explore them one by one. Good luck to try out other free action-packed challenges online to give you an ultimate treat of action and thrill!
